description.pres_first:
Hi! I'm Jacqueline, a software engineer. I love learning software technologies and applying them to solve real-world problems. 
I am currently pursuing a Masterâ€™s degree in Software Engineering at Carnegie Mellon University, focusing on enhancing my expertise in software engineering, scalable systems, distributed systems, and cloud computing.
description.pres_second:
I'm innovative and adventurous. In my free time, I like traveling, skiing, and communicating with different people. 
Persistent effort and unyielding perseverance, I believe, are the keys to success even in the face of failure.
description.title: About Me

items.title: Memory Allocator
items.content:
A dynamic memory allocator in C; optimized utilization and throughput by incorporating explicit free list, removing footers, and merging best-fit and first-fit algorithms

Link : https://github.com/Jacqueline-Tsai/memory-allocator

items.title: Code Autograder
items.content:
a code auto-grading website for scalability and production environments using Docker, JavaScript, Svelte, Astro, PostgreSQL, and Nginx; conducted functionality and scalability testing with Playwright and k6

Link : https://github.com/Jacqueline-Tsai/code-autograder

items.title: Bulleten Board
items.content:
A bulletin board website built using PHP and Apache, which is well protected from serveral attacks: SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, Webshell, command injection and CSRF attacks.

Link : https://github.com/Jacqueline-Tsai/bulletin-board-web-application

items.title: Finance Management Web App
items.content:
A finance management Web with statistic charts and , whiich is built by MySQL, Flask and ChartJS

Link : https://github.com/Jacqueline-Tsai/personal-finance-management-system

items.title: Nach OS
items.content:
A re-write of Nachos 3.4. Add debug mode, commnands: Log, Thread Yield, and scheduling methods: FIFO, SJF, PRIORITY

Link : https://github.com/Jacqueline-Tsai/operating-system-nachos
